item.description:
Dear Westborough spirituality meetup group member,

How are you? I know it is on April fool day and we are going to have March meetup. Execpt it is not in March.

Last month, we had a great time. We always have a great discussion and we share a lot of informations.

Spring is here now! We have been like a seed hide under ground and wait for this sunny weather to wake up. It seems we are oneness and wait to be awaken.

This is a new topic about "ONENESS".

It brings up a good topic for us to discuss.

What does oneness mean to you?

Join me for this discussion and we can take a little walk after discussion, If the weather is nice.

Thank you

 

   Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: When you drive into condos, the second building on your right. park any place with visit parking sign. apt #19, If you have trouble to find the location, please call me at 617-223-7166. Thank you
item.name: Westborough Spiritual March Meetup
